PackageOracle.name: DA_TITLE
PackageOracle.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE CHTR.DA_TITLE
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.40.23.230779000 PM -06:00 */
AS

FUNCTION add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,title_nm IN VARCHAR2
,program_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,original_audio_language_cd IN VARCHAR2
,run_time_minutes_num IN NUMBER
,animation_desc IN VARCHAR2
,content_provider_nm IN VARCHAR2
,data_source_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,rating_cd IN VARCHAR2
,source_system_id IN VARCHAR2
,service_category_nm IN NUMBER
,suggested_price_amt IN VARCHAR2
,title_asset_id IN VARCHAR2
,title_brief_nm IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
) return NUMBER;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,title_nm IN VARCHAR2
,program_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,original_audio_language_cd IN VARCHAR2
,run_time_minutes_num IN NUMBER
,animation_desc IN VARCHAR2
,content_provider_nm IN VARCHAR2
,data_source_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,rating_cd IN VARCHAR2
,source_system_id IN VARCHAR2
,service_category_nm IN NUMBER
,suggested_price_amt IN VARCHAR2
,title_asset_id IN VARCHAR2
,title_brief_nm IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,title_id IN NUMBER
,title_nm IN VARCHAR2
,program_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,original_audio_language_cd IN VARCHAR2
,run_time_minutes_num IN NUMBER
,animation_desc IN VARCHAR2
,content_provider_nm IN VARCHAR2
,data_source_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,rating_cd IN VARCHAR2
,source_system_id IN VARCHAR2
,service_category_nm IN NUMBER
,suggested_price_amt IN VARCHAR2
,title_asset_id IN VARCHAR2
,title_brief_nm IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,title_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

END da_title;

body.name: DA_TITLE
body.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY CHTR.DA_TITLE
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.40.23.243971000 PM -06:00 */
AS

FUNCTION add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,title_nm IN VARCHAR2
,program_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,original_audio_language_cd IN VARCHAR2
,run_time_minutes_num IN NUMBER
,animation_desc IN VARCHAR2
,content_provider_nm IN VARCHAR2
,data_source_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,rating_cd IN VARCHAR2
,source_system_id IN VARCHAR2
,service_category_nm IN NUMBER
,suggested_price_amt IN VARCHAR2
,title_asset_id IN VARCHAR2
,title_brief_nm IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
) RETURN NUMBER
IS
l_return_pk NUMBER;
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_title.add(fx), parms=' || title_nm || '|' || program_type_cd || '|' || original_audio_language_cd || '|' || run_time_minutes_num || '|' || animation_desc || '|' || content_provider_nm || '|' || data_source_type_cd || '|' || rating_cd || '|' || source_system_id || '|' || service_category_nm || '|' || suggested_price_amt || '|' || title_asset_id || '|' || title_brief_nm || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_title a
(
a.title_id
,a.title_nm
,a.program_type_cd
,a.original_audio_language_cd
,a.run_time_minutes_num
,a.animation_desc
,a.content_provider_nm
,a.data_source_type_cd
,a.rating_cd
,a.source_system_id
,a.service_category_nm
,a.suggested_price_amt
,a.title_asset_id
,a.title_brief_nm
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
chtr.s_title_id.NEXTVAL
,add.title_nm
,add.program_type_cd
,add.original_audio_language_cd
,add.run_time_minutes_num
,add.animation_desc
,add.content_provider_nm
,add.data_source_type_cd
,add.rating_cd
,add.source_system_id
,add.service_category_nm
,add.suggested_price_amt
,add.title_asset_id
,add.title_brief_nm
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
) RETURNING a.title_id INTO l_return_pk;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_title.add(fx)');
RETURN l_return_pk;

END add;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,title_nm IN VARCHAR2
,program_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,original_audio_language_cd IN VARCHAR2
,run_time_minutes_num IN NUMBER
,animation_desc IN VARCHAR2
,content_provider_nm IN VARCHAR2
,data_source_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,rating_cd IN VARCHAR2
,source_system_id IN VARCHAR2
,service_category_nm IN NUMBER
,suggested_price_amt IN VARCHAR2
,title_asset_id IN VARCHAR2
,title_brief_nm IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_title.add, parms=' || title_nm || '|' || program_type_cd || '|' || original_audio_language_cd || '|' || run_time_minutes_num || '|' || animation_desc || '|' || content_provider_nm || '|' || data_source_type_cd || '|' || rating_cd || '|' || source_system_id || '|' || service_category_nm || '|' || suggested_price_amt || '|' || title_asset_id || '|' || title_brief_nm || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_title a
(
a.title_id
,a.title_nm
,a.program_type_cd
,a.original_audio_language_cd
,a.run_time_minutes_num
,a.animation_desc
,a.content_provider_nm
,a.data_source_type_cd
,a.rating_cd
,a.source_system_id
,a.service_category_nm
,a.suggested_price_amt
,a.title_asset_id
,a.title_brief_nm
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
chtr.s_title_id.NEXTVAL
,add.title_nm
,add.program_type_cd
,add.original_audio_language_cd
,add.run_time_minutes_num
,add.animation_desc
,add.content_provider_nm
,add.data_source_type_cd
,add.rating_cd
,add.source_system_id
,add.service_category_nm
,add.suggested_price_amt
,add.title_asset_id
,add.title_brief_nm
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_title.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,title_id IN NUMBER
,title_nm IN VARCHAR2
,program_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,original_audio_language_cd IN VARCHAR2
,run_time_minutes_num IN NUMBER
,animation_desc IN VARCHAR2
,content_provider_nm IN VARCHAR2
,data_source_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,rating_cd IN VARCHAR2
,source_system_id IN VARCHAR2
,service_category_nm IN NUMBER
,suggested_price_amt IN VARCHAR2
,title_asset_id IN VARCHAR2
,title_brief_nm IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_title.add, parms=' || title_id || '|' || title_nm || '|' || program_type_cd || '|' || original_audio_language_cd || '|' || run_time_minutes_num || '|' || animation_desc || '|' || content_provider_nm || '|' || data_source_type_cd || '|' || rating_cd || '|' || source_system_id || '|' || service_category_nm || '|' || suggested_price_amt || '|' || title_asset_id || '|' || title_brief_nm || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_title a
(
a.title_id
,a.title_nm
,a.program_type_cd
,a.original_audio_language_cd
,a.run_time_minutes_num
,a.animation_desc
,a.content_provider_nm
,a.data_source_type_cd
,a.rating_cd
,a.source_system_id
,a.service_category_nm
,a.suggested_price_amt
,a.title_asset_id
,a.title_brief_nm
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
add.title_id
,add.title_nm
,add.program_type_cd
,add.original_audio_language_cd
,add.run_time_minutes_num
,add.animation_desc
,add.content_provider_nm
,add.data_source_type_cd
,add.rating_cd
,add.source_system_id
,add.service_category_nm
,add.suggested_price_amt
,add.title_asset_id
,add.title_brief_nm
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_title.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,title_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_title.del, parms=' || title_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
UPDATE chtr.t_title a
SET a.record_stat = 'D'
,a.modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP
,a.modified_by = del.audit_user
WHERE a.title_id = del.title_id
;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_title.del');

END del;

END da_title;
